articles.description: After the recent report of Sony's potential acquisition of Kadokawa, Xbox fans are concerned they may miss out on future FromSoftware games.
articles.content: Just a few days ago, it was reported FromSoftware parent company Kadokawa Corporation may be acquired by Sony. This raised concerns about console exclusivity, and if Sony would bring games under the … [+1686 chars]

articles.title: You Need to Download iOS 18.1.1 to Your iPhone Right Now - CNET
articles.description: According to Apple, the update provides two important security fixes to your device.
articles.content: Apple released iOS 18.1.1 on Nov. 19, less than a month after the tech giant released iOS 18.1. While that update brought a few new features to many iPhones, like call recording, iOS 18.1.1 has impor… [+1639 chars]
